The craziness continued. So to pick up from where the last episode was. I landed in Miami and then rented the car. Initial plan was to drive to St. Pete Tampa the same day. But instead I decided to go play volleyball. Then also found out that my body Sandro is going to be in town. So I ended up meeting with him. We went out in Wynwood, then Brickell, and then finally ended up in space. We were supposed to go to space initially. And we went there before midnight but then the tickets that he bought were for the wrong date. He had 12:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m. confused. And then they wanted $150 for tickets and I told them that's way too much money. So we tried to go to Wynwood instead but it really wasn't a Good vibe. Then break up. We found the spot that was decent but decided that you know what we're going to have a good time in space. Let's go do it. At that point it was already 2:00 a.m so he was feeling kind of sleepy and so was I. But we decided to leave it up to chance and flip a coin in order to determine if we're going or not. Heads was we go in and tails when we go home and sleep. 

Well it landed on heads. So we went in, paid $150 each and had an absolute blast. I had not partied like that in a long time if ever. We stayed until 10:00 a.m. dancing our hearts out. I was sweating like crazy. We went through so much water. 

The DJ was Dom dollar. Great set!  And then from there we went straight to the Airbnb. I rinsed off and grabbed my luggage. And we went and had breakfast/lunch and I dropped them off. And started heading to St Pete. From all that craziness I feel very depleted. Honestly still kind of awake but my immune system feels compromised like I need to put more vitamins in. I feel like I'm on the verge of getting sick.
